statements: SELECT * FROM podcast_episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM podcast_episodes WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT episode_description FROM podcast_episodes WHERE release_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM podcast_episodes WHERE duration_minutes BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT episode_title, duration_minutes FROM podcast_episodes ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM podcast_episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM podcast_episodes WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, duration_minutes FROM podcast_episodes WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC, episode_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM podcast_episodes WHERE episode_description LIKE '%technology%' AND duration_minutes < 60;
SELECT episode_title, release_date, duration_minutes FROM podcast_episodes WHERE episode_id IN (2, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM episode_metadata WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, publish_date FROM episode_metadata WHERE podcast_id = 10;
SELECT episode_title, duration_minutes FROM episode_metadata ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT podcast_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM listener_data GROUP BY podcast_id;
SELECT * FROM listener_data WHERE listen_date >= '2022-01-01' AND listen_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT episode_title, publish_date, duration_minutes FROM episode_metadata WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_title, duration_minutes FROM episode_metadata WHERE podcast_id = 101 ORDER BY episode_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM listener_data WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY listen_date DESC, playback_position_sec DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT listener_id, episode_title, listen_date FROM listener_data JOIN episode_metadata ON listener_data.episode_id = episode_metadata.episode_id ORDER BY listen_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT podcast_id, COUNT(episode_id) AS num_episodes FROM episode_metadata GROUP BY podcast_id HAVING num_episodes > 2 ORDER BY num_episodes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT episode_name, release_date FROM episodes WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT listener_name, email FROM listeners WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT episode_name, episode_description FROM episodes WHERE duration_minutes < 45 AND release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT listener_name, favorite_genre FROM listeners JOIN listener_episode_mapping ON listeners.listener_id = listener_episode_mapping.listener_id WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC, duration_minutes ASC
SELECT listener_name, favorite_genre FROM listeners WHERE subscription_status = TRUE
SELECT episode_name, episode_description FROM episodes WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND release_date <= '2021-12-31'

SELECT listener_name, episode_name, rating FROM listeners l JOIN listener_episode_mapping lem ON l.listener_id = lem.listener_id JOIN episodes e ON lem.episode_id = e.episode_id WHERE l.favorite_genre = 'Mystery' AND lem.rating > 4

SELECT listener_name, episode_name, timestamp FROM listeners l JOIN listener_episode_mapping lem ON l.listener_id = lem.listener_id JOIN episodes e ON lem.episode_id = e.episode_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM Podcasts;
SELECT podcast_name, author_name FROM Podcasts;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM Episodes;
SELECT listener_name, email FROM Listeners;

SELECT listener_name, episode_title, listen_date FROM Listeners JOIN EpisodeListeners ON Listeners.listener_id = EpisodeListeners.listener_id JOIN Episodes ON Episodes.episode_id = EpisodeListeners.episode_id;
SELECT * FROM Podcasts;
SELECT podcast_name, author_name FROM Podcasts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM Episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT listener_name, email FROM Listeners WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT p.podcast_name, e.episode_title, l.listener_name FROM Podcasts p JOIN Episodes e ON p.podcast_id = e.podcast_id JOIN EpisodeListeners el ON e.episode_id = el.episode_id JOIN Listeners l ON el.listener_id = l.listener_id WHERE l.listener_name LIKE 'Alice%' ORDER BY e.release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Episodes;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM Episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT podcast_name, host_name, category FROM Podcasts WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT listener_name, email, join_date FROM Listeners WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT podcast_name, host_name, rating FROM Podcasts JOIN Ratings ON Podcasts.podcast_id = Ratings.podcast_id WHERE Ratings.rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM Episodes;
SELECT episode_title, release_date, duration_minutes FROM Episodes WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT podcast_name, host_name, category, description FROM Podcasts WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT listener_name, email, join_date FROM Listeners WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
